title: Maquiladoras, Mexico’s Engine of Trade, Driven to Navigate Evolving Demand
description: Mexico’s maquiladoras, an important generator of manufacturing and employment activity along the U.S.–Mexico border, confront a changing landscape. Evolving global trade patterns, reflecting stressed supply chains and increasing electric vehicle production, will test maquiladora agility and growth prospects.
dc:creator: Cañas, Jesus
dc:subject: Maquiladora; Wages; Trade; Vehicles
